page.title: 15OVER SIXTIES WEDNESDAY CLUB
page.content: I am a Senior Citizen living in Chaddesley Corbett, which is a very friendly village. We have a Wednesday club which is run by the W.V.S. We have two meetings a month except August, we are taken by our voluntary drivers and brought home again. There are lots of interesting speakers on a variety of subjects, then we finish with tea and a raffle. The Club Birthday is remembered with a Special Tea and has been going for many years. Christmas is celebrated with a party and entertainment. Through the summer months we have many trips to the coast and country houses by coach which is all arranged for us. The club members take part in many events which are held in the village throughout the year.
